images.copyright: Klaus Littmann's FOR FOREST: The Unending Attraction of Nature in Wörthersee Stadion, Klagenfurt, Austria (© UNIMO)
images.title: 'FOR FOREST' by Klaus Littmann
images.caption: 'FOR FOREST' by Klaus Littmann
images.desc: When artist Klaus Littmann covered the pitch of this Austrian soccer stadium with 300 trees, he not only created the country's largest public art installation - he brought to life a vision of a dystopian future. The installation here at Wörthersee Stadium in the city of Klagenfurt made headlines around the world when it was unveiled on 8 September, 2019.
